title: Feminine Fashions in India
creator_contributor_role: Films Division, Government of India, production company

description: Presents the colorful costumes worn by women of India as their daily dress. The sari is the most commonly worn style, others shown include the Rajasthani ghagra, bodice and odhani, salvar kamiz and dupatta of Punjab and garara of Uttar Pradesh.
